item.title: Should Brazil be considered a cyber security threat?
item.description:
Cybercriminals frequently target major events like the Olympics to spread malware, and the 2016 Rio Games were no exception. While it’s crucial to stay vigilant against phishing attempts that exploit current events, a report from Fortinet, “FortiGuard Eye of the Storm,” highlights why the 2016 Olympics warranted particular concern. Although cyberattacks at the Olympics are not a recent phenomenon, with incidents dating back to the 2004 Athens Games, Fortinet raised concerns about the Rio Games for two key reasons that could impact attendees and have a ripple effect on those back home:..
